3.1. Base Object¶

class fuel_ci.objects.base.BaseObject(data, drivers=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Base object implementation

__init__(data, drivers=None)[source]¶

Constructor for base object

Parameters:
  • data – artifact data specified in YAML
  • drivers – dict of driver categories and names to use
drivers = {}¶

default dict of driver categories and names to use

update(**kwargs)[source]¶

Update current object fields according to specified arguments

3.2. Artifact¶

class fuel_ci.objects.artifact.Artifact(name, data, drivers=None)[source]¶

Bases: fuel_ci.objects.base.BaseObject

Artifact object

drivers = {'compress': None}¶

default dict of driver categories and names to use

version = 'latest'¶

version

url = None¶

url or localpath

archive = None¶

local path to packed artifact

meta = None¶

metadata

description = None¶

description

__init__(name, data, drivers=None)[source]¶

Constructs new artifact object

Parameters:
  • name – name of an artifact specified in YAML
  • data – artifact data specified in YAML
  • drivers – dict of driver categories and names to use
unpack()[source]¶

Call driver specified as “compress” to unpack current artifact

pack()[source]¶

Call driver specified as “compress” to pack current artifact

3.3. Artifact Storage¶

class fuel_ci.objects.artifact_storage.ArtifactStorage(name, data, drivers=None)[source]¶

Bases: fuel_ci.objects.base.BaseObject

Artifact storage object

drivers = {'storage': 'localfs'}¶

default dict of driver categories and names to use

__init__(name, data, drivers=None)[source]¶

Constructs new artifact storage object

Parameters:
  • name – name of an artifact specified in YAML
  • data – artifact data specified in YAML
  • drivers – dict of driver categories and names to use
download_artifact(artifact)[source]¶

Call driver specified as “storage” to find and download specified artifact

search_artifact(artifact)[source]¶

Call driver specified as “storage” to search for specified artifact

publish_artifact(artifact)[source]¶

Call driver specified as “storage” to publish specified artifact to current storage

3.4. Repository¶

Bases: fuel_ci.objects.base.BaseObject

Repository object

drivers = {'cvs': 'git'}¶

default dict of driver categories and names to use

branch = 'master'¶

default branch to checkout on repo clone

__init__(name, data, drivers=None)[source]¶

Constructs new repository object

Parameters:
  • name – name of an artifact specified in YAML
  • data – artifact data specified in YAML
  • drivers – dict of driver categories and names to use
clone()[source]¶

Call driver specified as “cvs” to clone current repo

3.5. Package¶

class fuel_ci.objects.package.Package(name, data, drivers=None)[source]¶

Bases: fuel_ci.objects.base.BaseObject

Package object

drivers = {'package': None}¶

default dict of driver categories and names to use

__init__(name, data, drivers=None)[source]¶

Constructs new package object

Parameters:
  • name – name of a package specified in YAML
  • data – package data specified in YAML
  • drivers – dict of driver categories and names to use
build(obj)[source]¶

Call driver specified as “package” to build package in desired format
